pathAssistantSteps.info:
To receive the quote PDF via e-mail after approval or to generate the quote after approval, ensure the following is true:

 > There is a primary contact

 > The opportunity is not in the Create stage

 > The Sold To, UC, Lessor, or Distributor or Payer status is not Unverified or Pending Validation, or has a Credit Block.


No Charge Product Category and Acknowledgement of Category Usage are required fields for any quotation with NCSO line items.
